main event: A bright object was observed on a clear night in Roswell, New Mexico, on September 3, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as moving at an angle of 45 degrees,The sighting involved one object with no physical evidence found,It was concluded that the bright light could be a satellite that appeared on the distant horizon,The observation was conducted by a civilian source,Detailed observation indicated variability in brightness and motion.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
